function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of green space quality assessment","Impact":"Inability to measure chronic mental health outcomes","Mitigation":"Develop methods for green space exposure assessment","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis technologies","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Limited studies assessing multiple animal groups simultaneously","Impact":"Incomplete understanding of wildlife interactions and disease propagation","Mitigation":"Conduct more comprehensive wildlife studies","Technologies":"Surveillance technology, ecological monitoring tools","People":"Wildlife researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, environmental organizations"}]}
